about.description:
Software Developer with experience in backend development and algorithmic problem-solving. 
 Missionary of appealing products.

items.name: Computer Engineering and Mathematics (Double Degree)
items.description: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering and Mathematics, with thesis based on unbalanced sets in Machine Learning.

items.name: Computer Engineering and Mathematics (Double Degree)
items.description: SICUE exchange program to learn about how different universities approach the same subjects.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Some of my expertise areas, but still open to learn more!

items.name: Competitive Programming
items.description: Participation in the SWERC (South Western Europe Regional Contest). It consists on a 3 members team solving complex algorithmic challenges in a pressure environment. Ranked 55th in 2022/2023, 46th in 2020/2021, and 80th in 2019/2020.

items.name: Advent of Code
items.description: Each Advent, 25 different coding problems are released, one each day. The goal is to solve them as fast as possible. I created a repository with my solutions  and explanations for each problem. For the time being it is only 2024, but I plan to keep expanding it in the future.

items.name: Local NAS with Debian & OpenMediaVault
items.description: NAS setup for family picture sharing and P2P file sharing, with extra automation through bash scripts and a Python Telegram bot.

items.name: Pokemon TCG Pocket Stats & Collection Web
items.description: Web application for managing a collection of cards for the mobile game and allowing offline capabilities to maintain and check statistics on your collections.

items.name: Backend Developer at ALTEN - AMADEUS
items.description:
Service Oriented APIs development with Quarkus + OpenAPI and Couchbase as NoSQL database. Usage of Kubernetes and ArgoCD for deployment and management of the application lifecycle. 
 Maintenance of legacy C++ functionalities.

items.name: Javascript API Developer at PROSEI
items.description: Internship focused on API development. The objective was to simplify users connections to a third-party service to automatically digitalize and manage the documents and bills of their company.

items.name: Scout Leader at Mafeking 133
items.description: Active participation in leadership and animation of youth groups from 11 to 17 years old.
